# Formatted Example Data

This folder contains formatted real-data GWAS files for MR-MOSS:

- Exposure: `Smoking_initiation`
- Outcomes: `AMD`, `AMD_dry`, `AMD_wet`

Each file follows MR-MOSS formatted-input requirements:

- `SNP`
- `A1`
- `A2`
- `Z`
- `N`
- `P`

These files are provided so users can run a full
`formatted data -> MRMOSS result` workflow directly in R.
